name: The Life & Diary of a Missionary
name_original: The Life & Diary of a Missionary
description:
The Life & Diary of a Missionary is a text-based Choose Your Own Adventure game, set in 1700's America. A traveling priest encounters people and events that will change the priest's life completely.

Currently the game has 2 main quests, more to come soon-ish.

Release v 0.11

- Restart function sometimes borks, restarting the browser/tab is the alternative solution. 
- Online version works well on Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox and Microsoft Edge. (Other browsers are not tested.) 
- Download version doesn't work on Microsoft Edge. 
- The game isn't tested on Linux or Mac but it shouldn't have any problems.
